mapper.select: SELECT s.SER_TTL, p.POST_TTL, p.POST_SB_TTL, p.POST_REP_CNT,p.POST_INQR_CNT, p.POST_LIK_CNT,p.POST_PBLC_DTM, p.POST_THUMN_PATH, p.POST_ID FROM post p INNER JOIN channel c ON p.CHNL_ID = c.CHNL_ID LEFT JOIN series s ON p.SER_ID = s.SER_ID WHERE c.CRT_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY p.POST_PBLC_DTM DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 5;
